LanguageData.VBE_SodaSyrup.label: soda syrup
LanguageData.VBE_SodaSyrup.description: A thick and disgustingly sweet mixture made by boiling citric acid and natural sugars together - Usually derived straight from cane sugar or as corn syrup. Must be cut with water and left to carbonate briefly in a sealed environment before consumption.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMush.label: ambrosia mush
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMush.description: Sliced and pressed ambrosia, can be left alone to ripen into must to be further distilled into an extremely fine liquor.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMust.label: ambrandy must
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMust.description: Fully ripened ambrosia liquified into essentially a thick juice and left alone to grow bacteria for fermenting. Ready to be distilled into a drinkable form.
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyMash.label: whiskey mash
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyMash.description: A starchy and mostly liquid mixture with pulpy chunks strewn throughout. Ready To be aged.
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaMust.label: tequila must
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaMust.description: A thin mixture of juiced agave sap or prickly cactus pear and insect meat starter, ready to be cut and fermented in a barrel.
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaMash.label: vodka mash
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaMash.description: A thick, starchy mash of raw potatoes and a starter, ready to be fermented.
LanguageData.VBE_GinMush.label: gin mush
LanguageData.VBE_GinMush.description: A clear but cloudy mixture of juiced berries and miscellaneous grain, ready to be fermented.
